review: No Web Browser (No Silk, No Chrome, No Firefox). Nothing!!!! This makes it impossible to leave fenced backyard and browse the world wide web. This is a major disappointment to me because I access a lot of streaming web content and podcasts that are not part of the closed environment. If, Amazon ever provides a web browser app, I will update this review to 5 STARS because I love how fast and easy this works for accessing Amazon prime content.

review: I can't find this answered anywhere and there is no questions section on this product.  Does it have home screens that can run widgets?  When not watching TV (which is most of the time) I want widgets displaying time, tide,weather, calendar agenda etc. It says there is android there somewhere, but if it is locked under a fixed interface, I'm not interested. Reducing stars further until I get an answer. So far, the G-box MX2 seems like the best in class for a true android experience.
